thread.title: Breaking: Court sentences Ugo-Ngali to 10 years for oil subsidy fraud
thread.title_full: Breaking: Court sentences Ugo-Ngali to 10 years for oil subsidy fraud

author: adekunle
title: Breaking: Court sentences Ugo-Ngali to 10 years for oil subsidy fraud
text:
Home » News » Breaking: Court sentences Ugo-Ngali to 10 years for oil subsidy fraud Breaking: Court sentences Ugo-Ngali to 10 years for oil subsidy fraud On 10:43 am In News by adekunle Comments 
The Ikeja High Court has sentenced Adaoha Ugo-Ngadi to 10 years for oil subsidy fraud. Adaoha Ugo-Ngadi 
Mrs. Ada Ugo-Ngali, Managing Director of Ontario Oil and Gas Limited, had fainted two weeks ago at the Lagos State High Court in Ikeja after being convicted of N754m oil subsidy scam by the court. 
Ugo-Ngali stood in the dock while Justice Lateefa Okunnu was delivering judgment in a N1.9bn subsidy scam trial in which she and three others were defendants. 
She suddenly slumped as the judge was about to pronounce the sentence, 
More details soon
